title: julia 0.6.2 fails to build on Ubuntu 16.04
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

1. Update spack to version 

```commit c8e3c94c6ffa8a5f24423e53958ee71cf98a60d6
Author: 健美猫 <weijianwen@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Apr 20 01:43:12 2018 +0800

    self has no attribute named satisfies. (#7826)
```
